short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Staggered, colorful encouraging words bursting from the bottom of the screen!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring fun and positivity to your browsing experience! This extension launches colorful, encouraging words that burst onto your screen like a confetti cannon, adding excitement and motivation to any webpage. Finished with a presentation or celebrating someone's accomplishments? Run this extension and watch words of encouragement fill the screen!
